Title: Excludes video camera recordings from cameras worn or used by police from being included as personnel records; makes certain records available to independent review boards
Summary: Excludes video camera recordings from cameras worn or used by police from being included as personnel records; makes certain records available to independent review boards investigating allegations of police or law enforcement misconduct.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law and the public officers law, in relation to excluding video camera recordings from cameras worn or used by police from being included as personnel records
